column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My husband and I were in Chicago last week. It was his first time in Chicago and he wanted some authentic deep dish pizza. I'd had Lou Malnati's before on a prior trip so brought him there. We shared The Malnati Chicago Classic which has lean sausage
column4: and crispy crust. We added mushrooms. He said it was the best pizza he's had in his life and it lived up to what I remembered from before. We ordered a bigger pizza so we'd have a couple pieces leftover and they held up well until the next day and the crust didn't become soggy overnight which was nice! Great pizza!!
